function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction workers being exposed to COVID-19 due to colleagues testing positive and continuing to work","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among construction workers and their families","Mitigation":"Enforce strict isolation protocols for workers who test positive, provide clear guidelines for sick leave, and implement regular testing and health screening","Technologies":"Health screening tools, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine for remote health monitoring","People":"Construction workers and their families","Owner":"Construction companies, management, and site supervisors"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with mask mandates in the construction industry","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers and site visitors","Mitigation":"Enforce strict mask-wearing policies, provide training on proper mask usage, and monitor compliance through supervision and inspections","Technologies":"Wearable technology for monitoring mask usage, communication apps for training and compliance checks","People":"Construction workers, site visitors, and management","Owner":"Construction companies, site supervisors, and safety officers"},{"Description":"Lack of regular communication between construction workers and managers regarding COVID-19 concerns","Impact":"Potential for unresolved issues and unaddressed concerns leading to increased risk of transmission and decreased morale","Mitigation":"Implement regular Host Q&A sessions, open communication channels, and provide anonymous reporting mechanisms for COVID-19 concerns","Technologies":"Communication apps for virtual meetings, anonymous reporting platforms, and feedback tools","People":"Construction workers, managers, and supervisors","Owner":"Construction management and supervisors"}]}
